page.title: 11Local Industry
page.content: Industry in this area consists of two industrial estates. The first is as {Monckton Road}and was built as an extension to existing textile mills. The other is at{Thornes Wharf.}As the name suggests this is next to the {River Calder}which has been canalised. {(Aire and Calder Navigtion).}Some old industries still exist e.g.Double 2 Shirts, a shipyard and an animal feed merchants. However in both cases the industrial estates are dominated by tertiary industries. Of the 52 units, 43 are tertiary. These include warehouses, maintenance firms and firms which hire out equipment. The Thornes Wharf estate, being near the city centre, provides more services. The Monckton Road estate, being near the M1, contains more warehouses.
